titleStmt.title: Scaramouch a philosopher, Harlequin a school-boy, bravo, merchant, and magician a comedy after the Italian manner : acted at the Theatre-Royal / written by Mr. Edward Ravenscroft.
titleStmt.author: Ravenscroft, Edward, 1654?-1707.
Molière, 1622-1673. Bourgeois gentilhomme.

notesStmt.note: Based in part on Molière's "Le bourgeois gentilhomme" and "Le mariage forcé".
